wikipedia_page.main: David Charles Harvey (29 July 1946 – 4 March 2004) was a historian and author.  He is notable for his seminal work, Monuments To Courage, which documents the graves of almost all recipients of the Victoria Cross, a task that took him over 36 years to complete.
